name: Baguette
instructions:
Make poolish by mixing 150g of flour with 150g of warm water and a pinch of yeast. Let ripen overnight.

240g warm water, 400g flour, poolish autolyse for 20 min.
incorporate 2g yeast then salt knead for 5 mins
rest 30 mins then strength building fold 
ferment 2 hr
make 4 balls then rest 20 min
shape and rise 45 min
preheat 550F
slash bread and bake, covered, at 485 for 10 min
uncover bake another 8-10 min
